content.json:
# Movement Navigation Overview

Unified dashboard combining movement success rate & blocked reason analytics.

**Telemetry Events:** `Navigation.Move.Success`, `Navigation.Move.Blocked`

**Objective:** Provide a single pane of glass to monitor traversal health, friction sources, and trends to guide world connectivity & normalization improvements.

**Thresholds:**
- üü¢ SuccessRate ‚â• 95%: Healthy
- üü° 90% ‚â§ SuccessRate < 95%: Warning
- üî¥ SuccessRate < 90%: Critical

**Related Issues:** #10, #281, #282

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(24h)
| where name in ("Navigation.Move.Success", "Navigation.Move.Blocked")
| summarize Success=countif(name == "Navigation.Move.Success"),
            Blocked=countif(name == "Navigation.Move.Blocked")
| extend Total = Success + Blocked
| extend SuccessRate = round(100.0 * Success / iff(Total == 0, 1, Total), 2)
| extend BlockedRate = round(100.0 * Blocked / iff(Total == 0, 1, Total), 2)
| extend Status = iff(SuccessRate >= 95, "‚úì Normal", iff(SuccessRate >= 90, "‚ö† Warning", "üî¥ Critical"))
| project Success, Blocked, Total, SuccessRate, BlockedRate, Status
content.title: Movement Success Rate (Last 24h)

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(24h)
| where name in ("Navigation.Move.Success", "Navigation.Move.Blocked")
| summarize Success=countif(name == "Navigation.Move.Success"),
            Blocked=countif(name == "Navigation.Move.Blocked")
| extend Total = Success + Blocked
| extend SuccessRate = round(100.0 * Success / iff(Total == 0, 1, Total), 2)
| extend BlockedRate = round(100.0 * Blocked / iff(Total == 0, 1, Total), 2)
| extend Status = iff(SuccessRate >= 95, "‚úì Normal", iff(SuccessRate >= 90, "‚ö† Warning", "üî¥ Critical"))
| project Status, Success, Blocked, Total, SuccessRate, BlockedRate
content.title: Movement Metrics Summary

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(24h)
| where name in ("Navigation.Move.Success", "Navigation.Move.Blocked")
| summarize Success=countif(name == "Navigation.Move.Success"),
            Blocked=countif(name == "Navigation.Move.Blocked")
            by bin(timestamp, 1h)
| extend Total = Success + Blocked
| extend SuccessRate = round(100.0 * Success / iff(Total == 0, 1, Total), 2)
| project timestamp, SuccessRate
| order by timestamp asc
content.title: Success Rate Trend (Last 24h)

content.query:
// Blocked Reasons Table (Last 24h)
let timeRange = 24h;
let knownReasons = dynamic(['invalid-direction', 'from-missing', 'no-exit', 'move-failed']);
let reasonCounts = customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(timeRange)
| where name == 'Navigation.Move.Blocked'
| extend reason = tostring(customDimensions.reason)
| extend normalizedReason = iff(reason in (knownReasons), reason, 'other')
| summarize Count = count() by normalizedReason;
let totalCount = toscalar(reasonCounts | summarize sum(Count));
reasonCounts
| extend TotalCount = totalCount
| extend PercentageShare = round(100.0 * Count / iff(TotalCount == 0, 1, TotalCount), 2)
| extend Alert = iff(PercentageShare > 50.0, '‚ö†Ô∏è HIGH', '')
| project 
    Reason = normalizedReason,
    Count,
    ["% Share"] = PercentageShare,
    Alert
| order by Count desc
content.title: Blocked Events by Reason (24h)

content.query:
// 7-Day Blocked Rate Trend
let timeRange = 7d;
customEvents
| where timestamp > ago(timeRange)
| where name in ('Navigation.Move.Success', 'Navigation.Move.Blocked')
| summarize TotalMoves = count(), BlockedMoves = countif(name == 'Navigation.Move.Blocked') by bin(timestamp, 6h)
| extend BlockedRate = round(100.0 * BlockedMoves / iff(TotalMoves == 0, 1, TotalMoves), 2)
| project timestamp, BlockedRate, BlockedMoves, TotalMoves
| order by timestamp asc
content.title: Blocked Rate Trend (7d)
Summary Statistics

content.json:
### Interpretation Guide

- High `invalid-direction` (>30%): Improve normalization & input UX.
- High `no-exit` (>40%): World connectivity gaps; inspect graph.
- High `from-missing` (>5%): Data integrity risk (player-location sync).
- High `move-failed` (>10%): System reliability / repository errors.

**Alert Threshold:** Any single reason >50% flagged as ‚ö†Ô∏è HIGH.

**Empty State:** No blocked events ‚Üí "No traversal friction detected ‚úì".
